hero.title: Welcome to Bitsmove
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive Web3 Solutions for Services, Products & Infrastructure
hero.description: Leading the future of decentralized technology with innovative blockchain solutions, smart contracts, and enterprise-grade infrastructure.

smart_contracts.title: Smart Contract Development
smart_contracts.description: Secure, audited smart contracts for DeFi, NFTs, DAOs, and enterprise applications. Full lifecycle development from concept to deployment.

defi.title: DeFi Solutions
defi.description: Decentralized finance platforms including DEXs, yield farming protocols, liquidity pools, and cross-chain bridges.

nft.title: NFT Marketplaces
nft.description: Custom NFT platforms, minting solutions, and digital asset marketplaces with advanced trading features.

dao.title: DAO Development
dao.description: Decentralized autonomous organizations with governance systems, voting mechanisms, and community management tools.

tokenization.title: Asset Tokenization
tokenization.description: Convert real-world assets into digital tokens with regulatory compliance and fractional ownership capabilities.

infrastructure.title: Blockchain Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Enterprise-grade blockchain infrastructure, node management, and cloud solutions for Web3 applications.

wallet.title: Bitsmove Wallet
wallet.description: Multi-chain digital wallet with advanced security features, DeFi integration, and NFT management.

dex.title: Bitsmove DEX
dex.description: Decentralized exchange platform with advanced trading features, liquidity mining, and cross-chain capabilities.

nft_platform.title: NFT Platform
nft_platform.description: Comprehensive NFT marketplace with minting tools, auction systems, and creator monetization features.

dao_tools.title: DAO Governance Tools
dao_tools.description: Complete suite of tools for decentralized governance, voting, and community management.

developer_tools.title: Developer Tools
developer_tools.description: Comprehensive SDK and APIs for building Web3 applications with ease and efficiency.

nodes.title: Blockchain Nodes
nodes.description: Reliable, high-performance blockchain nodes with 99.9% uptime and global distribution.

cloud.title: Cloud Infrastructure
cloud.description: Scalable cloud solutions optimized for Web3 applications with advanced security and monitoring.

apis.title: API Services
apis.description: Comprehensive APIs for blockchain data, transaction processing, and smart contract interactions.

security.title: Security Solutions
security.description: Advanced security measures including multi-signature wallets, hardware security modules, and audit services.

monitoring.title: Monitoring & Analytics
monitoring.description: Comprehensive monitoring tools for blockchain networks, smart contracts, and application performance.

about.title: About Bitsmove

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize access to blockchain technology by providing comprehensive, secure, and user-friendly Web3 solutions that empower businesses and individuals to participate in the decentralized economy.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the global leader in Web3 infrastructure and services, enabling seamless adoption of blockchain technology across industries and communities worldwide.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Constantly pushing the boundaries of blockchain technology to create cutting-edge solutions.

security.title: Security
security.description: Implementing the highest security standards to protect user assets and data.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Maintaining open communication and transparent practices in all our operations.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building and nurturing a strong community of developers, users, and partners.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A diverse team of blockchain experts, developers, and innovators working together to build the future of Web3.
